048public class DeepDetectionAction extends MapMode implements MouseListener {
049
050/*
051    protected int colorThreshold = ImageAnalyzer.DEFAULT_COLORTHRESHOLD,
052            thinningIterations = ImageAnalyzer.DEFAULT_THINNING_ITERATIONS;
053    protected double toleranceDist = ImageAnalyzer.DEFAULT_TOLERANCEDIST,
054            toleranceAngle = ImageAnalyzer.DEFAULT_TOLERANCEANGLE;

056    protected boolean showAddressDialog = true, mergeNodes = true, useAustriaAdressHelper = false, replaceBuildings = true;
057
058    public static final String PLUGIN_NAME = "deepdetection";
059
060    public static final String KEY_SHOWADDRESSDIALOG = PLUGIN_NAME + ".showaddressdialog",
061            KEY_MERGENODES = PLUGIN_NAME + ".mergenodes", KEY_AAH = PLUGIN_NAME + ".austriaadresshelper",
062            KEY_REPLACEBUILDINGS = PLUGIN_NAME + ".replacebuildings";
063
064   // protected Logger log = LogManager.getLogger(AreaSelectorAction.class.getCanonicalName());
065
066    protected Point clickPoint = null;
067
068    public DeepDetectionAction(MapFrame mapFrame) {
069
070
071        //hier die Anmeldung der Buttons !!
072        //erstmal durch Mouse Click wird vielleicht noch verbessert!
073        super(tr("Deep Detection Experiment"), "deepdetection", tr("Select  buildings from an underlying image."),
074                Shortcut.registerShortcut("tools:deepdetection", tr("Tools: {0}", tr("Deep Detection")), KeyEvent.VK_A,
075                        Shortcut.ALT_CTRL),
076                getCursor());
077
078        // load prefs
079        this.readPrefs();
080    }
081
082    protected void readPrefs() {
083        this.mergeNodes = new BooleanProperty(KEY_MERGENODES, true).get();
084        this.showAddressDialog = new BooleanProperty(KEY_SHOWADDRESSDIALOG, true).get();
085        useAustriaAdressHelper = new BooleanProperty(KEY_AAH, false).get();
086        replaceBuildings = new BooleanProperty(KEY_REPLACEBUILDINGS, true).get();
087    }
088
089    private static Cursor getCursor() {
090        return ImageProvider.getCursor("crosshair", "areaselector");
091    }
092
093    @Override
094    public void enterMode() {
095        if (!isEnabled()) {
096            return;
097        }
098        super.enterMode();
099        MainApplication.getMap().mapView.setCursor(getCursor());
100        MainApplication.getMap().mapView.addMouseListener(this);
101    }
102
103    @Override
104    public void exitMode() {
105        super.exitMode();
106        MainApplication.getMap().mapView.removeMouseListener(this);
107    }
108
109    public void updateMapFrame(MapFrame oldFrame, MapFrame newFrame) {
110        // or not, we just use Main to get the current mapFrame
111    }
112
113    /**
114     * Invoked when the mouse button has been clicked (pressed and released) on
115     * a component.
116     */
117    @Override
118    public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent e) {
119
120       // log.info("mouse clicked " + e);
121        System.out.println("mouse clicked"+ e);
122
123        if (!MainApplication.getMap().mapView.isActiveLayerDrawable()) {
124            return;
125        }
126        requestFocusInMapView();
127        updateKeyModifiers(e);
128        if (e.getButton() == MouseEvent.BUTTON1) {
129            clickPoint = e.getPoint();
130            LatLon coordinates = MainApplication.getMap().mapView.getLatLon(clickPoint.x, clickPoint.y);
131            new Notification("<strong>" + tr("DeepDetection") + "</strong><br />" + tr("Trying to detect an area at:")
132                    + "<br>" + coordinates.getX() + ", " + coordinates.getY()).setIcon(JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE)
133                    .show();
134            SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {
135
136                @Override
137                public void run() {
138                    try {
139                       // createArea();
140                        System.out.println("Mouse Event erfolgreich");
141                       BufferedImage bufferedImage_Layer= getLayeredImage();
142                       BufferedImage bufferedImage_Label= getLableImage();
143                       int increase=0;
144                        //Test für das Schreiben des Bildes
145                        String name=String.valueOf(increase);
146                        File label_file = new File("Bilderdaten"+File.separator+"layer"+name+".png");
147                        File layer_file = new File("Bilderdaten"+File.separator+"image"+name+".png");
148                        while(layer_file.exists()&& label_file.exists()){
149                          increase++;
150                          name=String.valueOf(increase);
151                          layer_file=new File("Bilderdaten"+File.separator+"image"+name+".png");
152                          label_file=new File("Bilderdaten"+File.separator+"layer"+name+".png");
153
154                        }
155                        if(!layer_file.exists()&& !label_file.exists()){
156                            ImageIO.write(bufferedImage_Layer, "png", layer_file);
157                            ImageIO.write(bufferedImage_Label,"png",label_file);
158                        }
159
160                        //nochmal nachgucken!!! funktioniert noch nicht richtig
161
162
163                        //
164
165
166                        System.out.println("Bild erfolgreich erstellt");
167                    } catch (Exception ex) {
168                        //log.error("failed to add area", ex);
169                        System.out.println(ex);
170                       // new BugReportDialog(ex);
171                    }
172                }
173            });
174
175        }
176    }
177
178
179
180    public BufferedImage getLayeredImage() {
181
182        //Test
183      //  List<GpxData> allGpxData = MainApplication.getLayerManager().getActiveDataLayer();
184
185
186      //layer.isVisible() && layer.isBackgroundLayer()
187
188        MapView mapView = MainApplication.getMap().mapView;
189
190
191        BufferedImage bufImage = new BufferedImage(mapView.getWidth(), mapView.getHeight(),
192                BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_BGR);
193        Graphics2D imgGraphics = bufImage.createGraphics();
194        imgGraphics.setClip(0, 0, mapView.getWidth(), mapView.getHeight());
195
196        for (Layer layer : mapView.getLayerManager().getVisibleLayersInZOrder()) {
197                if(layer.isVisible() && layer.isBackgroundLayer()) {
198                    Composite translucent = AlphaComposite.getInstance(AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER, (float) layer.getOpacity());
199                    imgGraphics.setComposite(translucent);
200                    mapView.paintLayer(layer, imgGraphics);
201                }
202        }
203
204        return bufImage;
205    }
206
207    /**
208     * Gibt nur die Labels des Bildes wieder. Je nach Konfiguration der Datenebene
209     * @return bufferedImage
210     */
211    public BufferedImage getLableImage() {
212
213        //Test
214        //  List<GpxData> allGpxData = MainApplication.getLayerManager().getActiveDataLayer();
215
216
217        //layer.isVisible() && layer.isBackgroundLayer()
218
219        MapView mapView = MainApplication.getMap().mapView;
220
221
222        BufferedImage bufImage = new BufferedImage(mapView.getWidth(), mapView.getHeight(),
223                BufferedImage.TYPE_INT_BGR);
224        Graphics2D imgGraphics = bufImage.createGraphics();
225        imgGraphics.setClip(0, 0, mapView.getWidth(), mapView.getHeight());
226
227        for (Layer layer : mapView.getLayerManager().getVisibleLayersInZOrder()) {
228            if(layer.isVisible() && !layer.isBackgroundLayer()) {
229                Composite translucent = AlphaComposite.getInstance(AlphaComposite.SRC_OVER, (float) layer.getOpacity());
230                imgGraphics.setComposite(translucent);
231                mapView.paintLayer(layer, imgGraphics);
232            }
233        }
234
235        return bufImage;
236    }

348    /**
349     * replace an existing way with the new detected one
350     * @param existingWay old way
351     * @param newWay new way
352     * @return replaced way
353     */
354    public List<Command> replaceWay(Way existingWay, Way newWay){
355        if (existingWay == null || newWay == null){
356            return null;
357        }
358        ArrayList<Command> cmds = new ArrayList<>();
359
360        cmds.add(new RemoveNodesCommand(existingWay, existingWay.getNodes()));
361
362        int i = 1;
363        for (Node existingNode : existingWay.getNodes()){
364            if (i < existingWay.getNodesCount() && existingNode.getParentWays().size() == 1 && !existingNode.isDeleted() && !existingNode.isNew()){
365                //                              log.info("delete node "+existingNode.toString());
366                cmds.add(new DeleteCommand(existingNode));
367            }
368            i++;
369        }
370
371        for (Node newNode : newWay.getNodes()){
372            existingWay.addNode(newNode);
373        }
374        if(newWay.isNew() && !newWay.isDeleted()){
375            cmds.add(new DeleteCommand(newWay));
376        }
377
378        return cmds;
379    }
380
381    public Way createWayFromPolygon(MapView mapView, Polygon polygon) {
382        Way way = new Way();
383
384        Node firstNode = null;
385        for (int i = 0; i < polygon.npoints; i++) {
386            Node node = new Node(mapView.getLatLon(polygon.xpoints[i], polygon.ypoints[i]));
387            if (firstNode == null) {
388                firstNode = node;
389            }
390            way.addNode(node);
391        }
392
393        if (polygon.npoints > 1 && firstNode != null) {
394            way.addNode(firstNode);
395        }
396        return way;
397    }
398
399    /**
400     * Merge Nodes on way to existing nodes
401     */
402    public Way mergeNodes(Way way) {
403        List<Node> deletedNodes = new ArrayList<>();
404        for (int i = 0; i < way.getNodesCount(); i++) {
405            Node node = way.getNode(i);
406
407            List<Node> selectedNodes = new ArrayList<>();
408            selectedNodes.add(node);
409            MapView mapView = MainApplication.getMap().mapView;
410            List<Node> nearestNodes = mapView.getNearestNodes(mapView.getPoint(selectedNodes.get(0)),
411                    selectedNodes, OsmPrimitive::isUsable);
412
413            for (Node n : nearestNodes) {
414                if (!way.containsNode(n) && !deletedNodes.contains(n)) {
415                    selectedNodes.add(n);
416                }
417            }
418            if (selectedNodes.size() > 1) {
419                Node targetNode = MergeNodesAction.selectTargetNode(selectedNodes);
420                Node targetLocationNode = MergeNodesAction.selectTargetLocationNode(selectedNodes);
421                Command c = MergeNodesAction.mergeNodes(selectedNodes, targetNode, targetLocationNode);
422
423                if (c != null) {
424                    UndoRedoHandler.getInstance().add(c);
425                    for (PseudoCommand subCommand : c.getChildren()) {
426                        if (subCommand instanceof DeleteCommand) {
427                            DeleteCommand dc = (DeleteCommand) subCommand;
428                            // check if a deleted node is in the way
429                            for (OsmPrimitive p : dc.getParticipatingPrimitives()) {
430                                if (p instanceof Node) {
431                                    deletedNodes.add((Node) p);
432                                }
433                            }
434                        }
435                    }
436                }
437            }
438        }
439
440        return (Way) MainApplication.getLayerManager().getEditDataSet().getPrimitiveById(way.getId(), OsmPrimitiveType.WAY);
441    }
442
443    /**
444     * merge node with neighbor nodes
445     *
446     * @param node
447     *            node to merge
448     * @return true if node was merged
449     */
450    public Command mergeNode(Node node) {
451        List<Node> selectedNodes = new ArrayList<>();
452        selectedNodes.add(node);
453        MapView mapView = MainApplication.getMap().mapView;
454        List<Node> nearestNodes = mapView.getNearestNodes(mapView.getPoint(selectedNodes.get(0)),
455                selectedNodes, OsmPrimitive::isUsable);
456        selectedNodes.addAll(nearestNodes);
457        Node targetNode = MergeNodesAction.selectTargetNode(selectedNodes);
458        Node targetLocationNode = MergeNodesAction.selectTargetLocationNode(selectedNodes);
459        return MergeNodesAction.mergeNodes(selectedNodes, targetNode, targetLocationNode);
460    }
